modName: Renames Blades sword to Akaviri Katana
summary: Renames all Blades swords to Akaviri Katanas, and adds Glenroy\'s Katana (From TES IV Oblivion) to Delphine\'s room in Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
My first mod for Skyrim. (And my first mod ever publicly released :3)
[COLOR=Gold]
Introduction
[/COLOR]

I don\'t really know why they renamed the Akaviri Katanas to Blades swords. This mod fixes that and renames all Blades swords to Akaviri Katanas, plus adds a pretty powerful, but not OP Glenroy\'s Akaviri Katana (From TES IV Oblivion) to Delphine\'s room in Riverwood.(Hidden)
I\'m not going to remove Glenroy\'s sword, because you don\'t have to take it. You can leave it there forever.
[COLOR=Gold]
Installation
[/COLOR]

Copy \"AkaviriKatanas.esp\" into your Skyrim/Data folder.
[COLOR=Gold]
Uninstallation
[/COLOR]

Remove \"AkaviriKatanas.esp\" from your Skyrim/Data folder.
[COLOR=Red]
SPOILER, LOCATION OF GLENROY\'S SWORD:
[/COLOR]
















[COLOR=Black]
It\'s behind the chest in Delphine\'s room.
[/COLOR]
author: Yetu
